data.description: Extract stream metadata from video files
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Video just seemed like the right place to put the module. In
    retrospect Multimedia might have been better, but there were no
    other modules in Multimedia...

    Anyway, Video::Info has already been sitting in that namespace for
    about a year now, I just finally thought it would be a good idea to
    register the namespace.
